text: Number of Hedge Fund Investors As Of Q4 2023 end: 302 Gotham Asset Management’s Q4 2023 Stake: $71.2 million Microsoft Corporation (NASDAQ:MSFT) is one of the world’s most valuable technology companies and also a leading player in the artificial intelligence race.
